H0.text: which greek god flew too close to the sun. Phaethon

H1.text: which greek god flew too close to the sun. Daedalus

H2.text: which greek god flew too close to the sun. Helios

H3.text: which greek god flew too close to the sun. Icarus

A4.text: Icarus ignored Daedalus's instructions not to fly too close to the sun, causing the beeswax in his wings to melt.

A5.text: Without warning, the heat from the sun softened and melted the wax.
